response.original_title: Marilyn Monroe: Portrait of a Legend...Suicide Or Murder?
response.overview: As the definitive sex symbol of all time, Marilyn Monroe's life continues to mystify us even today - over 30 years after her tragic death the question remains: Suicide Or Murder? Her private life has been probed and investigated more than once, but the cloud of mystique surrounding the life and death the most loved and envied goddess in history has never been completely unveiled until now.
response.title: Marilyn Monroe: Portrait of a Legend...Suicide Or Murder?
